chunks.text:
In regard to the Chalhoub residence on the Palm, would it be possible to kindly mobilise your team to support the unpacking of the furniture we have already received, on Thursday 10th and Friday 11th July?

 

We will not require the full team—just your most experienced and able movers and unpackers, perhaps around five. The boxes are already positioned in their respective areas; the scope will simply involve unpacking, positioning, removing outer boxes and crates, and applying protective wrapping to the items as needed.

 

Please confirm if these dates are convenient for you, and whether your team can also assist with arranging the necessary access passes in advance.

 

Below is the planned schedule:

 

Thursday 10th July

*       Ground Floor Family Room – Unpacking & Placement

*       1st Floor Family Area – Unpacking & Placement

*       Movement of Glass Italia pieces from Basement to Ground Floor

 

Friday 11th July

*       IC Studio – Unpacking & Placement

 

Important Notes:

*       Kindly ensure the team brings gloves for handling items and thick protective wrapping rolls for covering furniture.

*       I will provide shoe covers on-site.

 

Thank you in advance for your continued support. Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

Linton

---------- Forwarded message ---------

From: Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> >
Date: Sun, Jul 6, 2025 at 7:30 PM
Subject: Styling and Installation Planning | Week of 7th–18th July
To: IC <IC@etoilegroup.com <mailto:IC@etoilegroup.com> >, Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com> >, Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com> >
Cc: Patrick Chalhoub <Patrick.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com <mailto:Patrick.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com> >, Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com <mailto:Lali.Das@chalhoub.com> >




Dear Ingie,

Following our call on Sunday, please find attached the top-line planning activities for the next two weeks.

As discussed, I will begin the unboxing and placement of your current furniture in the following areas, while overseeing installations of the various suppliers:

Rooms in Focus This Week:

*       Ground Floor Family Room

*       1st Floor Family Area

*       Spa and Gym

*       IC’s Studio

Prior to initiating work in these spaces, I will kindly request Satish to arrange for a deep clean of each room. I will also ask Gordan to coordinate the installation schedule with Lemi Spa, Maletti, and TechnoGym suppliers.

chunks.text:
Prior to initiating work in these spaces, I will kindly request Satish to arrange for a deep clean of each room. I will also ask Gordan to coordinate the installation schedule with Lemi Spa, Maletti, and TechnoGym suppliers.

As approved the setting out was approved on Saturday, I’ll follow up with both Gordan and Hussain to ensure wall preparations are completed for:

*       Digital Art Screens

*       Glass Italia panels

*       Anish Kapoor artwork

Important Note:
With the Baccarat chandelier installation scheduled from 15th July, it would be ideal that all dusty works on the Ground Floor are completed before then, so we may shift into a white-glove, dust-free environment once the chandelier is installed.

Styling Activities Week:

Monday 7th July – Friday 11th July

Monday 7th July 

*  Study and Planning for Washroom/Bathroom Amenities

*  Documenting all Art Wall areas – For Art render placement plans

*  Study TV stand heights

*  Hanger samples follow-ups

Tuesday 8th July 

*  Receive Baccarat Chandelier Delivery

*  Receive Poltrana Delivery (or, 9th TBC)

*  Visit Saferoom Suppliers (Mirdif TBC)

Wednesday 9th July 

*  Art Handler collection of Anish Kapoor from Jumeriah Residence 

*  Transport Anish Kapoor to Palm

Thursday 10th July 

*  Ground Floor Family Room – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

*  1st Floor Family Area – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

*  Spa Area – Oversee Lemi Spa & Maletti Furniture Placement

Friday 11th July 

*  Gym – Oversee Techno Gym Equipment Placement

*  IC Studio – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

Monday 14th July

Friday 11th July 

*  Gym – Oversee Techno Gym Equipment Placement

*  IC Studio – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

Monday 14th July 

*  Visit IKEA to cost and plan samples for maid room furniture’s

*  Visit suppliers for washroom accessories

Tuesday 15th July 

*  Baccarat Chandelier Installation

*  Oversee Digital Art Screen Preparation (TBC with Stonehaven)

*  Oversee Glass Italia installation (TBC with Stonehaven)

Wednesday 16th July 

*  Baccarat Chandelier Installation

*  Oversee Digital Art Screen Preparation (TBC with Stonehaven)

*  Oversee Glass Italia installation (TBC with Stonehaven)

Thursday 17th July 

*  Study Accessories for Entertainment Room

*  Visit Suppliers for Linens (towels, robes, bedding)

Friday 18th July 

*  Supplier outreach: hangers, and miscellaneous accessories

*  Review villa naming and graphic designer for icon (TBC)

I hope these planning meets with your approval.

Kind regards

Linton

Thanks and Regards,



 

From: Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 
Sent: Monday, 7 July 2025 12:59 PM
To: Sanil Chandra <sanil@emoversuae.com>
Cc: Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com>; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>; Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>; Geeta Manjal <geeta.manjal@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Ingie Chalhoub <ingie.chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Satish Kumar <satish.kumar@khansaheb.com>; Gordon | Stonehaven <Gordon@stonehaven.ae>; Ramanathan Arumugam (ram@stonehaven.ae) <ram@stonehaven.ae>
Subject: Fwd: Styling and Installation Planning | Week of 7th–18th July

 

Dear Sanil,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

In regard to the Chalhoub residence on the Palm, would it be possible to kindly mobilise your team to support the unpacking of the furniture we have already received, on Thursday 10th and Friday 11th July?

 

We will not require the full team—just your most experienced and able movers and unpackers, perhaps around five. The boxes are already positioned in their respective areas; the scope will simply involve unpacking, positioning, removing outer boxes and crates, and applying protective wrapping to the items as needed.

 

Please confirm if these dates are convenient for you, and whether your team can also assist with arranging the necessary access passes in advance.

 

Below is the planned schedule:

 

Thursday 10th July

*       Ground Floor Family Room – Unpacking & Placement

*       1st Floor Family Area – Unpacking & Placement

In regard to the Chalhoub residence on the Palm, for our schedule on Thursday 10th and Friday 11th July, we have a small adjustment on the schedule.  

 

Below is the new schedule:

 

Thursday 10th July - Palm Jumeirah L32/34

09:00 to 11:00

Off Loading Baccarat




Jumeirah Residence Villa 30

11:30 to 14:30

- Supporting Mrs. Chalhoub to pack boxes to be sent to Palm Jumeirah L32/34




Note: the items are already in boxes, we just need to:

1. Tape up boxes

2. Number and Label Boxes

3. Repack some boxes if the current ones are damaged




Please can you ask the crew to take:

*	Tape
*	Extra Boxes
*	Markers  

Location: 
Villa 26a
33b Street
Off Al Urouba Road
Jumeriah 1 (I can send on WhatsApp the location pin).


On completion, we need to delivery the boxes to Palm Jumeirah before 4pm



Friday 11th July - Palm Jumeirah L32/34

09:00 to 15:30 

IC Studio – Unpacking & Placement

Ground Floor Family Room – Unpacking & Placement

1st Floor Family Area – Unpacking & Placement 




Important Notes:

·       Kindly ensure the team brings gloves for handling items and thick protective wrapping rolls for covering furniture.

·       I will provide shoe covers on-site.

 

Thank you in advance for your continued support. Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

Linton

Prior to initiating work in these spaces, I will kindly request Satish to arrange for a deep clean of each room. I will also ask Gordan to coordinate the installation schedule with Lemi Spa, Maletti, and TechnoGym suppliers.

	As approved the setting out was approved on Saturday, I’ll follow up with both Gordan and Hussain to ensure wall preparations are completed for:

	*       Digital Art Screens

	*       Glass Italia panels

	*       Anish Kapoor artwork

	Important Note:
	With the Baccarat chandelier installation scheduled from 15th July, it would be ideal that all dusty works on the Ground Floor are completed before then, so we may shift into a white-glove, dust-free environment once the chandelier is installed.

	Styling Activities Week:

	Monday 7th July – Friday 11th July

	Monday 7th July 

	*  Study and Planning for Washroom/Bathroom Amenities

	*  Documenting all Art Wall areas – For Art render placement plans

	*  Study TV stand heights

	*  Hanger samples follow-ups

	Tuesday 8th July 

	*  Receive Baccarat Chandelier Delivery

	*  Receive Poltrana Delivery (or, 9th TBC)

	*  Visit Saferoom Suppliers (Mirdif TBC)

	*  Transport Anish Kapoor to Palm

	Thursday 10th July 

	*  Ground Floor Family Room – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

	*  1st Floor Family Area – Furniture Unpacking & Placement

	*  Spa Area – Oversee Lemi Spa & Maletti Furniture Placement

	Friday 11th July 

	*  Gym – Oversee Techno Gym Equipment Placement

Thanks and Regards,



 

From: Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, 9 July 2025 7:31 PM
To: Sanil Chandra <sanil@emoversuae.com>
Cc: Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@etoilegroup.com>; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>; Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>; Geeta Manjal <geeta.manjal@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Ingie Chalhoub <ingie.chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Satish Kumar <satish.kumar@khansaheb.com>; Gordon | Stonehaven <Gordon@stonehaven.ae>; Ramanathan Arumugam (ram@stonehaven.ae) <ram@stonehaven.ae>
Subject: Re: Styling and Installation Planning | Week of 7th–18th July

 

Dear Sanil,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

In regard to the Chalhoub residence on the Palm, for our schedule on Thursday 10th and Friday 11th July, we have a small adjustment on the schedule.  

 

Below is the new schedule:

 

Thursday 10th July - Palm Jumeirah L32/34

09:00 to 11:00

Off Loading Baccarat

 

Jumeirah Residence Villa 30

11:30 to 14:30

- Supporting Mrs. Chalhoub to pack boxes to be sent to Palm Jumeirah L32/34

 

Note: the items are already in boxes, we just need to:

1. Tape up boxes

2. Number and Label Boxes

3. Repack some boxes if the current ones are damaged

 

Please can you ask the crew to take:

*	Tape
*	Extra Boxes
*	Markers  

Location: 

Villa 26a

33b Street

Off Al Urouba Road

Jumeriah 1 (I can send on WhatsApp the location pin).

 

On completion, we need to delivery the boxes to Palm Jumeirah before 4pm

 

Friday 11th July - Palm Jumeirah L32/34

09:00 to 15:30

Off Al Urouba Road

Jumeriah 1 (I can send on WhatsApp the location pin).

 

On completion, we need to delivery the boxes to Palm Jumeirah before 4pm

 

Friday 11th July - Palm Jumeirah L32/34

09:00 to 15:30 

IC Studio – Unpacking & Placement

Ground Floor Family Room – Unpacking & Placement

1st Floor Family Area – Unpacking & Placement 

 

Important Notes:

·       Kindly ensure the team brings gloves for handling items and thick protective wrapping rolls for covering furniture.

·       I will provide shoe covers on-site.

 

Thank you in advance for your continued support. Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

Linton

 

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 12:59 PM Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> > wrote:

	Dear Sanil,

	 

	I hope this message finds you well.

	In regard to the Chalhoub residence on the Palm, would it be possible to kindly mobilise your team to support the unpacking of the furniture we have already received, on Thursday 10th and Friday 11th July?

	 

	We will not require the full team—just your most experienced and able movers and unpackers, perhaps around five. The boxes are already positioned in their respective areas; the scope will simply involve unpacking, positioning, removing outer boxes and crates, and applying protective wrapping to the items as needed.

	 

	Please confirm if these dates are convenient for you, and whether your team can also assist with arranging the necessary access passes in advance.

	 

	Below is the planned schedule:
